implementation_notes: Created /requirekit-sync command specification at installer/global/commands/requirekit-sync.md. The command is a Graphiti sync/recovery tool that re-reads markdown files from docs/epics/ and docs/features/ and pushes them as episodes to Graphiti using upsert semantics. Key design decisions: (1) markdown-authoritative one-way sync with no conflict detection, (2) entity ID (epic_id/feature_id) as deduplication key, (3) graceful degradation when Graphiti disabled, (4) partial failure resilience - continues syncing remaining files, (5) dry-run preview mode. TDD approach: wrote 37 failing tests first (RED), then implemented command file (GREEN). File follows existing command patterns (epic-sync.md, feature-sync.md) but is simpler since it's one-way markdown-to-Graphiti only.
